summary: After a global nuclear war, the residents of Australia must come to terms with the fact that all life will be destroyed in a matter of months.
cast: Armand Assante|Rachel Ward|Bryan Brown|Jacqueline McKenzie|Grant Bowler|Allison Webber|Tieghan Webber|Steve Bastoni|David Ross Paterson|Kevin Copeland|Todd MacDonald|Joe Petruzzi|Craig Beamer|Jonathan Oldham|Trent Huen|Donni Frizzell|Jonathan Stuart|Sam Loy|Charlie Clausen|Robert Rabiah|Marc Carra|Rod Mullinar|Felicity Boyd|Bill Hunter|Charles 'Bud' Tingwell|Mark Mitchell|John Higginson|Kate Kendall|Heather Mitchell|Nicholas Hammond|Bruce Hughes|David Tredinnick|Antonia Murphy|Adam McKee|Michael Fry|Jennifer Castles|Peter Mendoza|Alyce Platt|Madeline Cenedese|Darren Casha|David Argue|Tom Considine|Catherine Sutherland|Mark Pennell|Warwick Begg|Sandra Murphy|Carlie Murphy|John Murphy|Robert Lowe|Rachel Valentyne|Christian Bell|Martin Copping|Julie Day|Naomi Ramos|Jorge Onasis|Nina Godinbo|Michael Carman|Frederique Fouche|Robbie MacFarlane|Christopher Cummins|Trent Baker|Stephanie Chen|Simon Lyssiotis|Davini Malcolm|Chris Sutherland|Steve Syson|David Taleski|Bassem Abousaid|Sholom Gelt|Joel Angus King|Pascal Mercay|Nicholas Simmons
title: En la playa
